# smoothbrain-sqlmigrate
A very simple library that provides a way to perform SQL migrations using pgxDB.

# sbsqlm

```go
import "github.com/barbell-math/smoothbrain-sqlmigrate"
```

A very simple library that provides a way to perform SQL migrations using pgxDB.
